title: Obim34
author: Obim34
content: Bitcoin has been performing very well these few days and it's very interesting, seeing your investment grow when others keep procrastinating to accumulate then. Once seeing the earliest price of Bitcoin at $20k, who would have imagined that so soon within a short  interval that the price will double. Those who had bought a handful of Bitcoin back then as for the much lower prices will be extremely happy to see their investment grow by 200%, 300% and more as even Bitcoin is yet to hit ATH.It is not too late to buy now as there is still a vacuum left for your investment to grow. Those who would fail to buy now might live to regret as this price range might not be seen again and it might still be a good option for those who already bought and still have what it takes to buy more might want to keep buying because at every buying price it is certain to make profits from it.

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: Bitcoin current price is more than 2x of its price in January in comparison to the final month of the year, I remember when some bloggers and social media stars where all spreading FUD saying may like fall to $10,000 or less while others believe it was the end of Bitcoin, but Thank God though for bitcoin did shame them will continue to do so and actually I was caught up with the FUD at that time because I was not an active member of this forum but now I Thank God that I can proudly say bitcoin FUD can never affect me

comments.author: Dailyscript
comments.body: OP, i like the fact that you brought this topic up for discussion. I am one of those people who did not buy any amount of bitcoin. comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: Well that's why in life, if you see any genuine risk that others are taking you join them and do same instead of always being a doubting Thomas. It's been long since Bitcoin price was being speculated and alot of persons where just seeing it as mere speculations, now they are seeing the results and regretting why they never accumulated Bitcoin long ago and now they're even seeing the price like unaffordable when it hasn't even gotten to ATH. In this life, it is risky not to take risk and if you take the risk and fall you rise up and move on then if it also works out for you, you become a wiseman just like people that accumulated Bitcoin long ago they're all wise ones now because they're reaping the dividends of the decision they took long ago.

comments.author: Justbillywitt
comments.body: Yes Bitcoin has been performing very well and no doubt that it will still continue to soar in price as there is a bullish momentum in the market and a high level of greed. I will advise we tread with caution and also be mindful of how we handle our activities this period. One mistake many people do is by going around and telling people to bring money let them invest in Bitcoin when the price is going higher. This will put unnecessary pressure on you. Let's buy the little we can buy and be satisfied with it. It is better that way than having many people on your neck as they were assured of profit and you know these things takes time and any little bad news around the world will cause a panic and there will be a dip in the market.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: There's a saying that everyone bought Bitcoin at the price they deserved, and I guess it's because some people see the very low price that they should have bought Bitcoin, but they ignore it and wait for a very significant dip before they can buy, and sometimes they get disappointed because the price never dips the way they had thought. Some people, too, may not actually have the money to invest in Bitcoin when the price was still low, but it was when the price might have spiked a bit that's when they finally got the money to invest, and I don't think one should not invest because of that. Instead of not investing, they could just use the DCA strategy to keep accumulating gradually while they still have a dip.
